item.title: Jittering
item.description: Get formatted versions: Word : PDF Orientation Graphical displays are effective when they connect well with human visual and cognitive faculties. Humans are extremely good at some visual tasks and surprisingly poor at others. To illustrate, consider the task of identifying how many 3â€™s there are in the following list: The task is difficult because recognizing shapes is a tough cognitive task. The task becomes much simpler if we take advantage of color, which our visual systems can process very quickly.
